---
name: copilot-instructions.semantickernel.md
description: Instructions for a C# .NET 8 Semantic Kernel console app using GitHub Models
---

You are assisting with a C# .NET 8 console application that uses Microsoft Semantic Kernel.

Guidelines:
- Target .NET 8
- Use top-level statements in Program.cs
- Do not invent files or folders unless explicitly requested
- Explain configuration steps before adding code
- Use GitHub Models (https://models.github.ai/inference) with AddOpenAIChatCompletion
- Assume GITHUB_TOKEN is provided via environment variables or user secrets
